comment: The outer measure of a set ` A ` is less than or equal to the extended addition of the outer measures of the decomposition induced on ` A ` by any ` E ` . Step (a) in the proof of Caratheodory's Method, Theorem 113C of [Fremlin1] p. 19. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
